channel.title: VelocityLiveRadio.com
channel.description: Velocity Live Radio is one of the fastest growing Internet Radio comedy / talk / entertainment / radio shows online! Join hosts Paul Verderosa, Kerri Dillon, Vinnie Maffea and Dan Moore as we discuss entertainment, movies, music, news and much more!

item.title: 2008 Holiday Show!
item.itunes:author: Velocity Live Radio
item.dc:creator: Velocity Live Radio
item.description:
This years show was hosted by Paul Verderosa, Kerri Dillon, Vinnie Maffea and Dan Moore.
Guests on the show included, Blake Lewis (Runner Up from season 6 of American Idol), Melissa Joan Hart (Television and Movie Actress) and Rachel Melvin (From NBCs Days of our Lives)!
We also had a little fun with The $50 Mystery Christmas Song and The Staff Gifts that were handed out!
So make sure you tune in and check it out!!
Have a Happy and Safe Holiday Season!
